## ScriptEvalOptions.onObserverExit property

Optionally specifies a registration function that shall register callbacks to be invoked when the observer of the current script evaluation is no longer active.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
onObserverExit?: (callback: () => void) => boolean;
```

## Remarks

This function is optional and shall be undefined when the script evaluation is not being observed.
